param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: locale_override
param.label: Locale Override
param.description: Define the locale you want the calendar to use to override the default

param.name: charset_override
param.label: Charset
param.description: Define the override charset you want the calendar to use e.g. UTF-8 or ISO8859-15

param.name: day_name_length
param.label: Length of the Day name
param.description: Select if you want to display the full dayname or a short version

param.name: first_day
param.label: Start week
param.description: Start the week at sunday or monday

param.name: Month_length
param.label: Short month name?
param.description: Select if you wish to display the full month name or not.

param.name: Month_offset
param.label: Month Offset
param.description: Offset the month so enter 1 for a month ahear, -1 for a month behind etc

param.name: Show_Tooltips
param.label: Show Tooltips?
param.description: Choose to show tooltips on mouse rollover on calendar dates.

param.name: Remember
param.label: Remember?
param.description: Remember which month/year is selected on page change, no jumping back to current day.
